about.p1: I am from Cordoba, Argentina. I consider myself a person with ambition for knowledge and learning, with an attitude and work ethic. Thanks to the different skills that I acquired with time and effort, I managed to position myself as a FrontEnd Developer. My greatest motivation is to continue learning and growing in the field of programming, to participate and contribute to new projects and challenges. I am passionate about programming and everything that can be achieved from code. I am currently studying BackEnd, MERN Stack (MongoDB - Express - React - NodeJs).
about.p2: I have knowledge of software and hardware, Office Tools, Photoshop, among others.

home.title: Front-End Developer
home.description: I have 3 years of experience designing and developing software. I love working on complete Web applications, using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React, accompanied by frameworks and Tools such as Bootstraps, Tailwind and more.
